description: This Python script demonstrates how to store and manage personalized memories and summaries in a SQLite database for a team-based agent system. It sets up agents, team configurations, and manages chat and memory interactions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, tools, and storage.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: Handles storage of memories in a SQLite database.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Manages the memory state for agents and teams.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model interface for Google Gemini.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model interface for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: Perplexity
classes.description: A model interface for Perplexity AI.

classes.name: SqliteAgentStorage
classes.description: Handles agent session storage in SQLite.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents with shared memory and configurations.

methods.name: print_chat_history
methods.description: Prints the chat history from a session run.

methods.name: print_team_memory
methods.description: Prints the team or user-specific memory.
